entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
